body_html: @apaszke I think this issue might deserve to be reopened. torch.flip isn't quite the same thing as negative striding or negative stepping -- torch.flip produces an (efficient) copy, but negative striding wouldn't need to perform a copy at all.
body_text: @apaszke I think this issue might deserve to be reopened. torch.flip isn't quite the same thing as negative striding or negative stepping -- torch.flip produces an (efficient) copy, but negative striding wouldn't need to perform a copy at all.
body: @apaszke I think this issue might deserve to be reopened. `torch.flip` isn't quite the same thing as negative striding or negative stepping -- torch.flip produces an (efficient) copy, but negative striding wouldn't need to perform a copy at all.
